name: Catch the Train
description:
Catch the Train!

You are the last hope to stop the train before a broken bridge.
Luckily you have a fast horse.

Use the space key to jump. That's all!

(You might need to click onto the game screen to have keyboard inputs working)

Rail carriage from @goch's Train Surfing project on Scratch
Background scrolling from @frozenghost's Pony express on Scratch
Character from @sigton on Scratch
Galloping horse by @Horseplane on Scratch
